purpose: To present key criteria for identifying target opportunities.
title: 4 key lenses to identify target opportunities

bullets.text: Address big markets globally – choose large (global) markets to play in
Value creation potential – measured by revenue, market share potential
Solve clear challenges – focus on must-haves versus nice-to-haves
Product-market fit – attractive market with a product / clear vision that satisfies it
Scientifically possible – vetted technology with real potential to scale
Commercially viable – scalable business model with attractive unit economics
Unlock of corporate assets and unfair advantage
Disrupt markets or create entirely new ones
Potential for ecosystem action – opportunities to collaborate with wider ecosystem to amplify impact
Superior to the current system – cleaner, cheaper, safer and less wasteful than incumbents
Tangible decarbonization potential - 50+ Mt pa CO2e reduction potential at scale
Changes the game – pioneers new industry standards for competitors to follow

reasoning_strategy: Evaluation of market opportunities through specific criteria.
